gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
UNCOUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
A standard
je raven kakovosti ali dosežka.

seg.quote: The acting ability of the pupils is of a high standard.
You're way below the standard required.
By any standard the work was good.

sense.def:
Standards
so etična načela, ki vplivajo na vedênje ljudi.

seg.quote: There has been a corruption of moral standards.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
standard
opišemo stvari, ki so običajne, normalne in veljajo za pravilne.

seg.quote: There is a standard procedure for recording drugs given to patients.

sense.def:
Kadar je delo ali besedilo o določeni témi
standard
, ga bere in pogosto komentira veliko število oseb.

seg.quote: This is the standard work on British moths.
